org.fcrepo.transform.http

Class FedoraTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource
      • org.fcrepo.http.api.FedoraBaseResource
        • org.fcrepo.http.api.ContentExposingResource
          • org.fcrepo.transform.http.FedoraTransform

  • @Scope(value="request")
 @Path(value="/{path: .*}/fcr:transform")
public class FedoraTransform
extends ContentExposingResource
    Endpoint for transforming object properties using stored or POSTed transformations.
    Author:
    cbeer
